oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Weighted Approximation theorem for Choldowsky generalization of the q-Favard-Sz\'asz operators
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Sharma, Preeti
Mishra, Vishnu Narayan
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Classical Analysis and ODEs
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We study the convergence of these operators in a weighted space of functions on a positive semi-axis and estimate the approximation by using a new type of weighted modulus of continuity and error estimation.
